name: Project Offiine
description:
Current Release Version: Alpha 1520 Current Development Version: 150708

Welcome to Project Offiine. Here, you will find changelogs, update files, and other information about Project Offiine. Only those that signed up for the alpha will have access to the full alpha.

Sign up for the alpha - https://goo.gl/2F9BJI

Project Offiine is a fighting game similar to that of Super Smash Brothers. Project Offiine is not a 1-to-1 fan game of Smash. This is intended to become sort of a mix between Smash and traditional fighting games.

For help, please email makarewproductionshelpdesk@gmail.com

Nothing in the alpha versions are representative of the final game.
